member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasDefaultColumns
member.summary: here defined part of columns from header. all the columns should be the sum of the default columns and the columns from the uncertain format type. For example: if bas name format type is 0

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasNameFormatType0
member.summary: Format 0 is generally used with the Jeffersonian Survey System and sub division of a section..

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasNameFormatType1
member.summary: Format 1 is generally used with abstract/tract/block data.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasNameFormatType2
member.summary: Format 2 is generally used with the Jeffersonian and Carter Survey System.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasNameFormatType3
member.summary: Format 3 is generally used with abstract data.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasNameFormatType4
member.summary: Format 4 is used for State and County boundaries.

member.name: T:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.BasNameFormatType6
member.summary: Format 6 is used for Abstract/Block/League data in Texas.

member.summary: This is the default constructor of the event args.
member.remarks: If you use this constructor, you have to set the properties manually.

member.summary: This is the constructor of the event args by passing the desired parameters.
